content: p age | 1 magic_ring cowl a simple bulky cowl by dani sunshine materials sizing yarn 100 ~ 110 yards bulky weight one size yarn height ~ 8 5 inches circumference ~ 18 inches needles 7mm circular needle 40 cm long gauge notions 1 stitch marker tapestry needle 14 st and 20 row= 4 inches in stockinette stitch adjust needle size if necessary to get gauge to begin cast on 72 stitches using the long tail cast on and join to knit in the round being careful not to twist your stitches  place a stitch marker to indicate the beginning of the round work 6 row approx 1 5 inches of 2 x 1 ribbing *k2 p1 repeat from * to end of round work the following alternating rib pattern until piece measures 7 inches from cast on edge *k5 p1 k2 p1 repeat from * to end of round work 6 row of 2 x 1 ribbing bind off all stitches loosely in pattern cut yarn leaving a 6 inch tail use a tapestry needle to weave in ends instructions brilliant video from knittinghelp com showing how to bind off in ribbing http //www knittinghelp com/video/play/binding-off-in-pattern-example-ribbing-continental pattern copyright © lioness arts
